channel.title: Client run.bat and buuild.bat problems
channel.description:
Hey im having two problems with the client i recently downloaded the client was called server it came with was called Zanaris.
these are the two problems.
My run.bat code: [code]@echo off title Client cd ./build/classes/ java -Xmx512m client 30 0 highmem members 32 pause [/code]
The error it gives me: [code]Error: Could not find or load main class client Press any key to continue . . .[/code]
and then there's another problem i'm having with the build.
Build.bat code: [code]@echo off Title Compiler "C:\Program Files (x86)\Java\jdk1.7.0_03\bin\java.exe" -d ./build/classes/ ./src/*.java ./src/sign/*.java pause [/code]
Problem it gives me: [code]Unrecognized option: -d Error: Could not create the Java Vitrual Machine. Error: A fatal exception has occurred. Prgram will exit. Press any key to continue . . .[/code]
Thank you.

item.title: Client run.bat and buuild.bat problems
item.dc:creator: @darkhero40 darkhero40
item.description:
@darkhero40 wrote:

dude the run is the simpliest thing on the planet! ok so this is what u have java -Xmx512m client 30 0 highmem members 32 before where it says java paste this C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.7.0_07\bin then right \ and then it will be C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.7.0_07\bin\java -Xmx512m client 30 0 highmem members 32 now add "before C:\ and one after java now its like this “C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.7.0_07\bin\java” -Xmx512m client 30 0 highmem members 32 also the part that says jdk1.7.0_07 is my version of java also ur java might not be in Program files maybe Program Files (x86) Finally done posting hope this helps

Read full topic

item.title: Client run.bat and buuild.bat problems
item.dc:creator: @badbeex badbeex
item.description:
@badbeex wrote:

Hey im having two problems with the client i recently downloaded the client was called server it came with was called Zanaris.

these are the two problems.

My run.bat code:

@echo off title Client cd ./build/classes/ java -Xmx512m client 30 0 highmem members 32 pause

The error it gives me:

Error: Could not find or load main class client Press any key to continue . . .

and then there’s another problem i’m having with the build.

Build.bat code:

@echo off Title Compiler "C:\Program Files (x86)\Java\jdk1.7.0_03\bin\java.exe" -d ./build/classes/ ./src/*.java ./src/sign/*.java pause

Problem it gives me:

Unrecognized option: -d Error: Could not create the Java Vitrual Machine. Error: A fatal exception has occurred. Prgram will exit. Press any key to continue . . .

Thank you.

Read full topic
